metadata.name: " Paradson"
metadata.description:
Psychological violence - or moral violence, mental violence, emotional violence - is a common form of mistreatment towards the person. It is a form of violence without any physical violence . These are acts, generally repetitive, comprising verbal threats, social isolation, intimidation or the fact of commonly imposing on the person


Paradson ( paradise + prison)
is being in a situation that looks so comfortable and beautiful from the outside whereas the inside is full of pain by invisible violence


Let me shout 

Where I have pain, you can't even see 
What I want to say, you can't even hear
...
Let me shout on your eyes 
If you are looking for a reliever 
Don't even try,  I'm already dead 

Hamideh 
Novambre 2022_Martinique
